name: Community Gatepath (formerly CCRC) VITA
description: Free tax preparation for low-income individuals and families
fullDescription: Community Gatepath provides free tax preparation services for low-income individuals and families in Santa Clara County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free tax preparation
- Help with federal and state returns
- Assistance with tax credits
- IRS-certified volunteer preparers
howToGetIt:
1. Check the Community Gatepath website for current information
2. Locations and schedules vary by year
3. Gather required tax documents
4. Attend your appointment
